headline: Is It Time To Reassess Constellation Energy (CEG) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Constellation Energy is priced attractively after its run in recent years, starting with the valuation is a straightforward way to frame that question. The stock last closed at US$271.14, with a 1% gain over the past week, a 20.8% decline over the past month, a 26.0% decline year to date, and a 13.0% decline over the past year, set against a very large 3 year return of about 3x. Recent attention on Constellation Energy has focused on its role in US power...

headline: 3 Alternative Energy Stocks to Watch Despite Rising Cost Pressure

headline: $9.8 Billion Utilities ETF Is A 3% Yielding Backdoor Bet on AI’s Explosive Growth
summary: The Vanguard Utilities Index Fund ETF Shares (NYSEARCA:VPU) generates its 2.73% dividend yield by holding a diversified portfolio of 67 utility companies across the electric, gas, and water sectors. Investors receive quarterly distributions funded by the dividends these underlying holdings pay out. VPU manages $9.8 billion in assets while charging just 0.09% in annual fees, ... $9.8 Billion Utilities ETF Is A 3% Yielding Backdoor Bet on AI’s Explosive Growth
